effect.en: Once per turn, you can discard 1 card, then Special Summon 1 Level 5 or lower Warrior non-Effect Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Fusion Summon.) You cannot Normal Summon/Set the turn you activate this Skill.
